Description: Job Description:·        Troubleshoot, identify and repair complex network issues for WAN, LAN, Wireless and Internet connections, and end-user issues.·        Respond to emergency network outages in accordance with business continuity and disaster recovery plans assisting other departments as required.·        Ability to design, implement and maintain WAN, LAN and wireless networks including cisco routers, switches, DC F5 Load balancer and Cisco Wireless controllers.Skills
Skills: ·        Ability to design, implement and maintain WAN, LAN and wireless networks including cisco routers, switches, DC F5 Load balancer and Cisco Wireless controllers.
·        Excellent knowledge in (DWDM, IPLC & MPLS) technologies.
·        Excellent knowledge on LAN Encryption solution
·        Ability and solve network vulnerabilities tickets.
·        Prepare and maintain documentation and drawing of network standards, configurations, and procedures.
·        Strong interpersonal written and verbal communication skills
·        Should have minimum 10+ years of experience in Network Domain
